text: I agree - we currently use comments to name and document

Not sure if this has been suggested or not... and, I KNOW the "Copy JSON" button is for the purpose of pasting that JSON into local development tooling, butâ€“ for some things, I find developing in the Design Tools can be faster, and an import button like this would certainly speed up the process of copying existing module configurations. Anyone agree?

Right, editing the raw JSON config of module fields would do the trick too
99% of the time i just use the CLI. but there is a few times i just quickly need to edit the JSON. And it is such a pain authorizing a new portal fetching the theme and then pushing the changes

I've never saw one of those before but for sure, that will help
